## ActionDefinition interface

Settings that define an action

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ActionDefinition<Input, Output, Scope = unknown, Events extends ChangeModel = ChangeModel, Views extends ReadModel = ReadModel, Dependencies extends (string & keyof Views)[] = []> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dependencies?](./paramodel.actiondefinition.dependencies.md) | Dependencies | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional array of vies keys that the action depends upon during execution.<!-- -->These views will automatically be synced to the current version just before the action is executed and are made available via the [ActionContext.view()](./paramodel.actioncontext.view.md) function. |
|  [input](./paramodel.actiondefinition.input.md) | Type&lt;Input&gt; | Action input type |
|  [output?](./paramodel.actiondefinition.output.md) | Type&lt;Output&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional action output type |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [exec(this, context)](./paramodel.actiondefinition.exec.md) | Executes the defined action |
